task: Develop a basic 'Final Fight' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Accretion'.
name: Rising Fury
branding_data: {'short_description': 'Rising Fury is a side-scrolling beat-em-up game where players fight through waves of enemies, progressively gaining strength and abilities as they progress.', 'detailed_description': 'Rising Fury takes inspiration from classic beat-em-up games like Final Fight, offering intense side-scrolling action. Players choose from a roster of unique fighters, each with their own fighting style and special moves. As players battle through urban environments filled with thugs and bosses, they accumulate power and abilities, following the oblique strategy of "Accretion". This mechanic allows players to gradually build up their characterâ€™s skills, combos, and power-ups, creating a dynamic and evolving gameplay experience. With cooperative multiplayer modes, players can team up to take down challenging foes and bosses, making for an engaging and replayable action game.', 'tags': ['beat-em-up', 'action', 'side-scrolling', 'multiplayer', 'progression', 'fighting', 'retro']}
